title: Zombies Ate My Neighbors
content:
Anybody knows this font? It was used as the logo for 1993 Konami's videogame Zombies Ate My Neighbors for the SNES

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131143032im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Zombies_Ate_My_Neighbors_box_4373.jpg)
author: astrapolaris

comments.content:
in the former century there where illustrators the could drawn a font from scratch, as brett sayd.  
i knew several guys that made new fonts almost daily ;)

There are similar fonts available.  
Try:  
 [http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=DET0000289](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131143032/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=DET0000289 "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=DET0000289")

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typonauten/b-movie-retro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131143032/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typonauten/b-movie-retro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typonauten/b-movie-retro/")

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/monster-mash/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131143032/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/monster-mash/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/monster-mash/")

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeart/frontline/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131143032/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeart/frontline/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeart/frontline/")

Stephen

Mmmh... you are right Brett, the 'E's cannot lie.

Thanks a lot Stephen for the suggestions.
